visible.expr: identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && (!identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding NIN') && !identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in place of Residence') && !identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in Place of Residence of Child'))

requiredOn.expr: identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && (identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Update of name by adding names appearing on the Passport, Birth Certificate and Academic Documents') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding parents including in contested cases'))

visible.expr: identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && (!identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding NIN') && !identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in place of Residence') && !identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in Place of Residence of Child'))

identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && (identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Update of name by adding names appearing on the Passport, Birth Certificate and Academic Documents') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in name by deletion of nicknames, pet names and titles') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change of information to clarify initials') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change In Order of Names') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction in spelling errors, name variation, vernacular version of names, short names') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding place of Origin') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in Age') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Inclusion or deletion of maiden name') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding parents including in contested cases') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding place of origin for a Child'))

identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && (identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in place of Residence') || identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Change in Place of Residence of Child'))
identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Get First ID')
identity['userServiceTypeCop'] != null && identity['userServiceTypeCop'].get(0).value.equalsIgnoreCase('Correction of error regarding place of Origin')
(identity.get('preRegistrationId') != empty) && (identity.get('tickIfOperatorMadeChanges') == 'Y')
(identity.get('age') >= 16 && identity.get('applicantUnabletoSign') == null) || (identity.get('age') >= 16 && identity.get('applicantUnabletoSign') != 'Y')
identity.get('age') >= 16
(identity.get('age') < 16 && identity.get('introducerUnabletoSign') == null) ||  (identity.get('age') < 16 && identity.get('introducerUnabletoSign') != 'Y')
identity.get('age') < 16
